00033   MAC_PAN_AT_CAPACITY_STATUS        = 0x01,
00034   MAC_PAN_ACCESS_DENIED_STATUS      = 0x02,
00035   // IEEE802.15.4 table - 78.
00036   MAC_SUCCESS_STATUS                = 0x00,

00049   MAC_NO_SHORT_ADDRESS_STATUS       = 0xEC,
00050   MAC_PAN_ID_CONFLICT_STATUS        = 0xEE,
00051   MAC_REALIGNMENT_STATUS            = 0xEF,
00052   MAC_TRANSACTION_EXPIRED_STATUS    = 0xF0,
00053   MAC_TRANSACTION_OVERFLOW_STATUS   = 0xF1,
00054   MAC_TX_ACTIVE_STATUS              = 0xF2,
00055   MAC_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE_STATUS  = 0xF4,
00056   MAC_INVALID_ADDRESS_STATUS        = 0xF5,
00057   MAC_INVALID_INDEX_STATUS          = 0xF9,
00058   MAC_LIMIT_REACHED_STATUS          = 0xFA, 
00059   MAC_ON_TIME_TOO_LONG_STATUS       = 0xF6,
00060   MAC_PAST_TIME_STATUS              = 0xF7,
00061   MAC_READ_ONLY_STATUS              = 0xFB,
00062   MAC_SCAN_IN_PROGRESS_STATUS       = 0xFC,
00063   MAC_SUPERFRAME_OVERLAP_STATUS     = 0xFD,
00064   MAC_TRACKING_OFF_STATUS           = 0xF8
00065 } MAC_Status_t;
